mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values(seq_board_bno.nextval, #{title},#{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno = #{bno}
select bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc, regdate desc
select x.rnum, x.* from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from tbl_board order by bno desc, REGDATE desc) a where rownum <= #{page}+9) x where x.rnum >=#{page}
select x.rnum, x.* from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from tbl_board order by bno desc, REGDATE desc) a where rownum <= #{pageStart}+#{perPageNum}-1) x where x.rnum >=#{pageStart}
select x.rnum, x.* from( select rownum as rnum, a.* from( select * from tbl_board order by bno desc, REGDATE desc) a where rownum <= #{pageStart}+#{perPageNum}-1) x where x.rnum >=#{pageStart}
select * from tbl_board where bno > 0 order by bno desc limit
select count(bno) from tbl_board where bno > 0
